title: Convert BCD to Integer
description: This function converts a Binary-Coded Decimal (BCD) represented as a BYTE into its corresponding INTEGER value. The conversion process masks the lower four bits of the BYTE and shifts the upper four bits to compute the integer representation.
name: BCDC_TO_INT

input.name: IN
input.description: A BYTE input representing the BCD value to be converted.

return_value.description: The resulting integer value derived from the given BCD input.
